entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chelsea
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
